page.title: 10LIFE IN WENTBRIDGE-WENTHILLS
page.content: Most of the people who live in Wentbridge have chosen to do so because they want to enjoy the peace of the countryside around and at the same time to be able to get to the places where they work. It is the sort of place where many people would like to live, so the houses there are very expensive. There are no council houses in the area at all. Wentbridge does not have its own school. The school closed down many years ago. There are hardly any children living in Wentbridge. There is a playgroup for children under school age. There are good facilities for eating out, but no other centres for activities. Wentbridge has its own church, built by a resident, but comes under the Darrington Parish.
